rukus.text: tse ne fakt shcho tam chas koly lyudsʹkyy vkhodyv do kompetentsiyi nichoho ne buty z·hadane
My stvoryuvaly lyudsʹkyy z ridkoyi sumishi, z dvokh batʹkiv, aby vyprobuvaty yoho. Otzhe, my zrobyly yomu slukhach ta seer
My pokazaly yomu dva shlyakhy, todi vin abo appreciative, abo unappreciative
My hotovi do disbelievers skriplyaye lantsyuhom, kaydany, ta palayuche Peklo
Yak dlya dobrochesni, vony vyp'yutʹ z chashok spiced z nektarom
vesna shcho rezervuyetʹsya dlya BOZHYKH sluzhbovtsiv; tse khlyne tomu shcho vony budutʹ
Vony fulfill yikhni zastavy, ta povaha denʹ tse nadzvychayno tyazhko
Vony daruyutʹ yikhnye ulyublene prodovolʹstvo do bidnoho, syroty, ta v'yaznya
My hoduyemo vas zarady BOHA; my ne ochikuyemo vynahorody vid vas, ne spasybi
My bo z nashoho Lorda denʹ tse povno neshchastya ta nespokoyu
Otzhe, BOH zakhyshchaye yikh z zla shcho dnya, ta nahorodzhuye yikh z radistyu ta contentment
Vin nahorodzhuye yikh dlya yikhnʹoho steadfastness z Rayem, ta shovkom
Vony rozslablyayutʹsya tam na rozkishnomu vbranni. Vony strazhdayutʹ niyake teplo sontsya, ne budʹ-yakoho kholodnoho
tinʹ nakryvaye yikh tam, ta frukty prynosyatʹsya poruch
Vony sluzhatʹsya napiy u sribnykh konteynerakh ta chashkakh tse - translucent
Translucent chashky, khoch zrobyly sribla; vony pravylʹno zasluzhyly vse tse
Vony polyublyayutʹ napiy duzhe smachnykh smaku
Z vesny tam znav yak "Salsabeel
Sluzhatʹ yim budutʹ nevmyrushchi sluzhbovtsi. Koly vy bachyte yikh, vony budutʹ vyhlyadaty, yak rozihnani perly
De zavhodno vy dyvytesʹ, vy pobachyte blazhenstvo, ta dyvovyzhnyy dominion
Na nykh bude odyah zelenoho oksamytu, atlasu, ta sribla ornamenty. Yikhniy Lord zabezpechytʹ yikh z chystymy napoyim
Tse yavlyaye soboyu vynahorodu shcho ochikuye vas, dlya vashykh zusylʹ buly otsineni
